DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate drop viral load 10 day treatment S-1360 versus placebo HIV-infected patient previously take anti-HIV medication .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparing 4 Doses Of GW810781 Versus Placebo In HIV-Infected Patients
DOC.criteria: No prior HIV medication . HIV infection viral load > 40050,000 copies/mL . CD4 cell count > 50 cells/mm . Patients require medication interrupt duration study . Abnormal ECG chronic health condition note screen physical exam . Previous participation experimental drug trial ( ) within 30 day screen visit study .
